project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple contact book that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and user interaction will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to add a contact
Implement function to search for a contact
Implement function to update a contact
Implement function to delete a contact
Implement function to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement function to load contacts from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure they operate correctly
